:::Orion:::

::Orion starts to come to. He rubs his eyes and sees Klant::
Orion: Uhhh, Klant, whats going on? Is the battle still going on?





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> A tiny, one person craft went through time to Prehistoric Earth, 
the pilot looking to help out in the war, since he graduated from his 
army fighting school that his father took him to. It took a long 
time. Too long, since he flunked out more than once and took the 
whole thing over again so many times. But he finally got it right, 
and went to assist the Maximals in this war. He looked for a clear 
place to land, and decided that a fine place would be near that base 
with the fight going on. It just may be the Maximals, maybe they were 
attacking someone. He started in for a landing. Diskus looked up and 
seen the ship.
> 
> Diskus: Diskus came in ship. Not one that big, but big. uzz, Mr, 
heeheehee...
> 
> Klant, still carrying Orion, stayed clear of the battle, but he 
still seen the ship.
> 
> Klant thinking: Great, some new Alliance guy coming, probably, the 
Maximals, how shall they survive this? They can't survive such an 
onslaught. He would have to try and jump the Alliance member after he 
landed, he's fresh and new and perhaps even powerful, and I can't 
just stand here and let the Maximals down.
> 
> The ship tried to maneuver past the gun fire, and the pilot thought 
it would be best to land a short distance from the battle, he started 
landing in what seemed like a good spot. Thus begins the story of 
Tarantopulous...
